Original:
我很高興在一位上政治學校的朋友的幫助下發現了這家隱藏的餐廳🥹
我們點的是拿鐵、美式咖啡，還有這裡唯一的飲料，咖啡+巧克力巴斯克起司蛋糕和非炸魚餅！
蛋糕濕潤鬆軟，炸魚餅雖然沒有炸，但還是酥脆的，兩種食物的結合令人驚嘆。
如果你住在政治大學附近，你一定要來這裡。
如果您在正和大學附近旅行，一定要來參觀一下。
EN:
I am very happy to discover this hidden restaurant with the help of a friend of a political school 🥹
We ordered latte, American coffee, and the only drink here, coffee+chocolate Bask cheese cake and non -fried fish cake!
The cake is wet and soft. Although the fried fish cake is not fried, it is still crispy. The combination of two foods is amazing.
If you live near the University of Politics, you must come here.
If you travel near the university, you must come to visit.
